remarks: The restriction of a uniform topological space to an open set is a uniform space.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Dec-2017.)
statement:
ressusp.1 $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
ressusp.2 $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` W ) $.
ressusp $p |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> ( W |`s A ) e. UnifSp ) $.
